## Giving and Receiving
{: .no_toc .text-delta }

1. TOC
{:toc}

## あげる
give

## くれる
give

## もらう
receive

## Favors
You can use the negative to make the request a little softer.
- て Form + くれる
- て Form + Potential Form of むらう
